learningPath.title: Topic Map
learningPath.description: This interactive map visualizes the topics of the selected exam and the relationships between them. By seeing the dependencies between topics, you can plan your study more effectively.
learningPath.tip: Tip: You can scroll through the map to navigate between topics, and use the buttons to zoom in and out.
learningPath.noDependencies: This topic is independent, it does not require any prerequisites.

careerPath.title: Career Path Map
careerPath.description: This interactive map visualizes the certifications in the selected career path and the relationships between them. By seeing which certifications you should take in what order, you can plan your career more effectively.
careerPath.noLeadsTo: This is the highest level certification in this path.

analytics.title: Study Analytics
analytics.description: This page analyzes your study habits and performance. You can track which topics you are strong or weak in, your most productive study times, and your progress with visual graphs.
analytics.note: Note: These analytics are based on your study data in the current session. For more comprehensive analysis, you can become a member.
analytics.progressDescription: Changes in accuracy rate and study time during your study sessions.
analytics.studyDurationTip: Your most productive studies take place in 60-90 minute sessions. Try to target this duration.
analytics.regularityTip: You should develop a regular study habit. Don't leave more than 2-3 days between sessions.
analytics.topicDistributionTip: You should spend more time on Cloud Migration and Cloud Innovation topics.
analytics.weekdayDescription: Your study time and performance according to the days of the week.
analytics.timeOfDayDescription: Your study time and performance according to the time of day.
analytics.topicDistributionDescription: Distribution of questions you've studied by topic.
analytics.recommendationsDescription: Based on your performance, here are some recommendations for your study plan.
analytics.focusTopicsTip: These are the topics where your performance is below average. Focus on improving these areas.
analytics.reviewRegularlyTip: Regular review of topics you've already mastered will help reinforce your knowledge.
analytics.balanceStudyTip: Try to balance your study across all topics rather than focusing too much on a few.

noRegistration.title: No Registration Required
noRegistration.description: Start practicing immediately without creating an account

detailedAnalysis.title: Detailed Analysis
detailedAnalysis.description: Get comprehensive feedback on your performance

upToDate.title: Up-to-date Questions
upToDate.description: Practice with the latest exam questions

examList.selectExam: Select the exam you want to prepare for and start practicing right away.
examList.noExamsFound: No exams found matching your criteria.
examList.examDescription: This exam measures fundamental knowledge in cloud computing and is an important step for those looking to build a career in the industry.
examList.platformDescription1: With Exam Mate, preparing for certification exams has never been easier. Get access to practice questions without registration.
examList.platformDescription2: Our platform provides up-to-date questions and detailed explanations to help you succeed in your certification journey.
examList.title: Available Exams
examList.noResults: No exams found matching your criteria.

practice.title: Practice Mode
practice.description: See correct answers and explanations after each question. Ideal for learning.

real.title: Real Exam Mode
real.description: See results only after completing the exam. Ideal for simulating the real exam experience.

topic.title: Topic-Based Study
topic.description: Focus on questions from specific categories. Ideal for focusing on areas you need to improve.

quiz.question: Question

confirmFinish.title: Finish Exam?
confirmFinish.message: You have {{unanswered}} unanswered questions. Are you sure you want to finish?

quiz.passedMessage: You have successfully passed the exam!
quiz.failedMessage: You can try again with more practice.

exams.title: Exams
exams.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the exam "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

questions.title: Questions for {{examTitle}}
questions.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this question? This action cannot be undone.
questions.noQuestions: No questions found. Click 'Add New Question' to create one.

errors.correctRequired: You must select a correct option

bulkImport.title: Bulk Import Questions
bulkImport.instructions: Paste your questions in markdown format below. The system will parse the questions and show you a preview before importing.
bulkImport.placeholder: Paste your questions in markdown format here...
bulkImport.previewInstructions: Preview of {{count}} questions. Please review before importing.
bulkImport.parseError: Failed to parse questions. Please check the format.
bulkImport.noQuestionsFound: No questions found in the provided text. Please check the format.

terms.acceptanceText: By accessing or using Exam Mate, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
terms.intellectualPropertyText: All content on this platform, including questions, answers, and explanations, is the property of Exam Mate and protected by copyright laws.
terms.userConductText: You agree not to misuse the platform or attempt to access restricted areas without authorization.
terms.disclaimerText: The platform is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
terms.limitationText: Exam Mate shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages.
terms.governingText: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Turkey.
terms.changesText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of any changes.
terms.contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us.

privacy.introductionText: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect and use information when you use our platform.
privacy.informationCollectionText: We collect minimal information necessary for the functioning of our platform.
privacy.cookiesUsageText: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our platform.
privacy.thirdPartyServicesText: We may use third-party services that collect information as you use our platform.
privacy.dataProtectionText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information.
privacy.userRightsText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your information.
privacy.changesText: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

cookies.introductionText: This Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies on our platform.
cookies.whatAreCookiesText: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website.
cookies.typeOfCookiesText: We use essential cookies for the functioning of our platform and analytics cookies to improve our services.
cookies.howWeUseText: We use cookies to remember your preferences and provide you with a better experience.
cookies.thirdPartyCookiesText: Some cookies are placed by third parties on our behalf.
cookies.controlCookiesText: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish through your browser settings.
cookies.changesText: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.
cookies.contactText: If you have any questions about this Cookie Policy, please contact us.
